project.name: C-C476G-OSSL-04-ST04-DT06-DF06-CF18-01
project.description: Creating test case using base program. Added an environment variable read to get a key in order to read in data from shared memory. Completed injection.

iopair.name: C-C476G-OSSL-04-ST04-DT06-DF06-CF18-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: Generate an RSA private key Good inputs: 1) taintvar is less than 64 characters long.Bad input: 1) taintvar is greater than or equal to 64 characters long.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 5023 -s 125 -m "brah" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid" ]]; then killtree.sh -s 9 -p $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid") && echo "Killed shared memory server."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory server PID file does not exist."; fi

if [[ -f "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id" ]]; then ipcrm -m $(cat "/opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id") && echo "Deleted shared memory segment."; else echo "Failed: Shared memory ID file does not exist."; fi

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

iopair.name: C-C476G-OSSL-04-ST04-DT06-DF06-CF18-01-GOOD-10
iopair.description: Generate SSL certificate and private key Good inputs: 1) taintvar is less than 64 characters long.Bad input: 1) taintvar is greater than or equal to 64 characters long.

process.script: nohup shm_setup -k 5023 -s 125 -m "brah" -o /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.id > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.out 2>&1 & echo $! > /opt/stonesoup/workspace/inputDaemons/shared_memory_01.pid && echo "Shared memory created"
